ETYMOLOGY: From Middle English hennesforth, equivalent to hennes ('from hence') + forth. Hennes is from Old English heonan (from here).

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: adverb: a word or phrase that modifies or qualifies an adjective, verb, or other adverb or a word group, expressing a relation of place, time, circumstance, manner, cause, degree, etc.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: From this time forward; from now on.
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: Henceforth, all official communications will be conducted via email.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 从今以后，所有官方沟通都将通过电子邮件进行。
